product_name: Overland Equipment Madera Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: The Overland Equipment Madera shoulder bag organizes everything you need for the day. The main pocket has a magnetic snap closure and a dedicated rear zip pocket holds and protects your tablet. Bag features a front zippered organizer pocket that also holds travel documents and a dedicated exterior quick-access cell phone pocket on front. Overland Equipment Madera shoulder bag is made from a durable, water-resistant nylon fabric and has an adjustable shoulder strap.
short_description: The Overland Equipment Madera shoulder bag organizes everything you need for the day. The main pocket has a magnetic snap closure and a dedicated rear zip pocket holds and protects your tablet.
